Articles.Content:
Why not both? Gerpanese!

The best amalgamation ever!

Why not both? Gerpanese!

This is the kind of pedantic nonsense up with which I will not put!

So, I come back just in time for more off-topic nationalism, Stahp!!! Before Odin gets pissy!!! XD

But it shows how great and highly viewed Germany is in the world!
Hey chobit, how are my flags coming along?

So, I saw many posts I'd like to comment on. But by the time I got this far, I'd forgotten everything...

Chobit, DO NOT CHANGE THE VAHALLAN CULTURE AGAIN. I will hurt you.

So, I saw many posts I'd like to comment on. But by the time I got this far, I'd forgotten everything...

Chobit, DO NOT CHANGE THE VAHALLAN CULTURE AGAIN. I will hurt you.

I second this threat!

Also, just comment on the last two pages then if your stuck.
Very well, and sorry Canopus, got sidetracked, painting planets on a flag is difficult considering a flag needs to be simplistic
No problem chobit:)
Try drawing them in your style, and then using the trace feature of a vector program (like your SAI) to simplify them.

Changing the culture will probably have serious side effects in how the plot plays out, as well as making it necessary to retouch any images that have symbolism in them to fit the new culture correctly.

It's probably best to keep it as it is, and just avoid anything that is likely to upset people because of its historic significance.

You guys are getting better about the off topic stuff too. I only had to remove one page this time instead of several.

Edited May 23, 2013 by OdinYggd
Oh Odin~<3 Where would we be without you!
Unfortunately, Odin seems to have also eaten my post asking chobit which WIP image she's working on next.
Odin needs nourishment as well.

Also, I'm making him a Duke. *pins a medal to his chest*

As for next pic, not sure yet

only a Duke, i think he should be an Earl

and Chobit, can you please work on separation????
EDIT: Bah, nevermind.

That inscription on the hatch off "Breath"'s Lander should be changed to

SAUERSTOFF O2

Wartungszugang

Wait... are you adding a monarchy-based hierarchical (spelt right first try! I am AWESOME) system to Vahalla now, Chobit?

Remind me to kick you next time I see you...

Edited May 24, 2013 by Trekkette
Nope, if I'm the Gott-Kaiserin of the Fan-works forum, I can run here like a monarchy and PfL can have a presidentary or whatever it's called

The pictures are very nice, but don't you think that you should have some more men besides that one copilot in a background?

I mean, if this is the anime version of KSP (done by studio Fantasia, I presume), it's quite likely that we know how the Jeb of this world looks like....

(....are you going to tell me that he already succumbed to radiation poisoning, and that it's his grave in the 11th picture?)

Nope, if I'm the Gott-Kaiserin of the Fan-works forum, I can run here like a monarchy and PfL can have a presidentary or whatever it's called

As long as there's logic, I'm happy...

Nope, if I'm the Gott-Kaiserin of the Fan-works forum, I can run here like a monarchy and PfL can have a presidentary or whatever it's called

Constitutional monarchy. Like the UK has.

They still have their royalty, but also have Parliament to actually run things while the royals operate with a very limited executive authority.

I suppose it would work fairly well for a space colony, being a natural step up from the chain of command on board a ship done by adding a committee to the existing chain of command with the commanding officer at the top.
hey odin, you are now helping the offtopicness...

WOOHOO!!! Can I be Gott-Kaiserin of the Fanworks forum now?

(Also: Yes, there are plans for male kerbals, but I suck at male physiology, you've been warned)
awesome cant wait to see it , chobit go look at the off topic thread, its punny
